src

Class ReportCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.ReportCreator

  • public class ReportCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    The ReportCreator class. This class provides all of the functions necessary to produce the multiple report types for the system.
    Author:
    Thomas Davidson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReportCreator() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearDatabase()
      clearDatabase is used to clear the persistent database of services for that week This function exists to be called by the timer class, since the week for these services has expired.
      void makeAllReports()
      makeAllReports acquires two lists: one for every provider from that week and one for every member from that week It then calls to make member reports for every member and provider reports for every provider It then calls to make the manager report
      void makeManagerReport()
      makeManagerReport is responsible for making the manager report when called.
      void makeMemberReport(int memberNumber)
      makeMemberReport creates a member report for a single member, specified by their number.
      void makeProviderReport(int providerNumber)
      makeProviderReport creates a provider report for a single provider, specified by their number.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReportCreator

        public ReportCreator()

    • Method Detail

      • makeManagerReport

        public void makeManagerReport()
        makeManagerReport is responsible for making the manager report when called. It first has to determine all of that week's providers It then lists the provider number, # of consultations, and their overall fee Once every provider has had the above done, the overall # of providers, consultations, and fee is displayed.

      • makeProviderReport

        public void makeProviderReport(int providerNumber)
        makeProviderReport creates a provider report for a single provider, specified by their number. It first retrieves the personal data of that provider It acquires a list of every service in the service record that the provider provided. It then goes through each one, printing the service specific info. Finally, the total # of consultations and total fee to be paid are displayed.
        Parameters:
        providerNumber, - the provider we want to make a report for

      • makeMemberReport

        public void makeMemberReport(int memberNumber)
        makeMemberReport creates a member report for a single member, specified by their number. It first retrieves the personal data of that provider. It acquires a list of every service in the service record that the provider provided. It then goes through each one, printing the service specific info.
        Parameters:
        memberNumber, - the member we want to make a report for

      • makeAllReports

        public void makeAllReports()
        makeAllReports acquires two lists: one for every provider from that week and one for every member from that week It then calls to make member reports for every member and provider reports for every provider It then calls to make the manager report

      • clearDatabase

        public void clearDatabase()
        clearDatabase is used to clear the persistent database of services for that week This function exists to be called by the timer class, since the week for these services has expired.
